casebody.data:
BIO-MEDICAL
v.
NCDHHS. No. 549A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2007. Lee M. Whitman, Raleigh, Sarah M. Johnson, Winston-Salem, for Bio-Medical Applications. Thomas R. West, Pamela A. Scott, William R. Shenton, Raleigh, Chad W. Essick, for Total Renal Care. Amy Y. Bason, Angel E. Gray, Assistant Attorney Generals, for NCDHHS. S. Todd Hemphill, Diana E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Health Systems Management.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of January 2007 by Plaintiff for Leave to File a Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2007."
